title: Hannah Brown flashes her abs as she puts on a sweaty display following DWTS rehearsal
text:
She revealed last week that she was done with the roses and only had her eye on the DWTS mirrorball trophy from now on.

And former Bachelorette Hannah Brown proved she was putting in the hard yards on Saturday, when she was spotted following dance practice.

The 25-year-old beauty flashed her abs while waiting for her ride.

Scroll down for video

Hard at work: Hannah Brown proved she was working hard to win that mirrorball on Saturday, flashing her taut abs and putting on a sweaty display following rehearsals for Dancing With The Stars

Hannah rocked a black sports bra underneath a mauve colored cropped long-sleeved top.

She teamed the look with full length black leggings that ensured all eyes were on her taut abs.

The former beauty queen opted for grey ankle socks and $98 Alo Yoga slides and she carried with her two large bags.

Fit and toned: Hannah rocked a black sports bra underneath a mauve colored cropped long-sleeved top

Stay tuned! The beauty took to social media earlier in the day to tease her upcoming dance

Hannah's dark blonde hair was slicked back off of her face and she was makeup free following the sweat session.

The beauty took to social media earlier in the day to tease her upcoming dance.

'I've been working really hard and I feel like some of you Hannah Beast fans are really going to like this dance,' she said while showcasing her new 'beast' necklace.

The past few weeks have seen rumors circulate that Hannah is more than friends with her DWTS partner, Alan Bersten.

Beast mode! 'I've been working really hard and I feel like some of you Hannah Beast fans are really going to like this dance,' she said while showcasing her new 'beast' necklace

Denied: The past few weeks have seen rumors circulate that Hannah is more than friends with her DWTS partner, Alan Bersten

The reality star cleared up the speculation last week where she insisted they were nothing more than dancing partners and pals.

'We are dance partners, and we have the best time together, and we have a friendship that is great,' she told Us Weekly.

'I think I'm done with roses, so mirrorball [trophy] is what we have our eye on.'

Hannah's confessions come after she called off her short-lived engagement to Bachelorette winner, Jed Wyatt, after learning he had a girlfriend back home in Nashville.

As for runner up, Tyler Cameron, it is believed his short fling with Gigi Hadid is also over.
description: Hannah Brown proved she was working hard to win that mirrorball on Saturday, flashing her taut abs and putting on a sweaty display following rehearsals for Dancing With The Stars.
